text: Norbwert Owona is a Cameroonian former international footballer. Owona scored against Nigeria during the 1970 FIFA World Cup qualification campaign. Owona was part of the team that finished in third place at the 1972 Africa Cup of Nations, scoring in third-place playoff against Zaire. In August 2018, Owona featured in a television documentary showing that he was homeless and suffering from an inguinal hernia. Following the documentary, it was reported that Samuel Eto'o had arranged for Owona to have somewhere to live.https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/football/45354827 == References == Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Cameroonian footballers Category:Cameroon international footballers Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Union Douala players Category:1972 African Cup of Nations players
title: Norbert Owona
